name: Internet Generation
description:
"Internet Generation" is a beat 'em up action game, in which you will play as a newcomer to a chat server. Experience interesting things in this chaotic server, and use your keyboard to carry out your "justice".
A moderator removed a r34 art? Beat them up!
Someone is flexing their pulls? Beat them up!
A simp is simping over VTubers? Beat them up!
Pick up your keyboard, and let us rip through the internet!

What you can do in this game:

You will learn different skills by completing levels, and perform satisfying combo attacks with over 20 unique skill combinations.
Uppercut! Earthshatter! Show those unfortunate enemies which of these is more durable - their head, or your keyboard!

You think you're bad at action games? Scared of getting stuck? No worries, we also have buffs in this game:
Use your [Virtuousness and braveness] to burn them all!
Show your [Uniqueness] to deal critical damage to your opponents!
Or ensure your [Political correctness] to become invincible!
And more than 20 other special buffs waiting for you to try them out.

What you can see in this game:

There are many fantastic scenes of the internet in this game.
Pass through an internet sewerage network that can lead to anywhere;
Travel over a digital ocean made up of countless displays;
Explore a gigantic library filled with wires and hard-drives;
Hop between old-school TVs, and return to the world of memories.
And more magnificent scenes to be discovered.


Besides that, there also are cute character arts, nearly a thousand frames of hand-drawn pixel animations, a funny and vivid single-player story that is waiting for you to explore.
